#summary Load order of packages in Seaside 2.9
#labels Phase-Implementation

Details: http://seaside.googlecode.com/files/seaside-dependencies-reduced-2009-02-01.svg

= Basic =
 * Seaside-Platform
 * Seaside-Squeak-Platform
  * Seaside-Tests-Platform
  * Seaside-Tests-Squeak-Platform
 * Seaside-Core
  * Seaside-Tests-Core
 * Seaside-Squeak-Core
  * Seaside-Tests-Squeak-Core
 * Seaside-Canvas
  * Seaside-Tests-Canvas
 * Seaside-Session
  * Seaside-Squeak-Continuation (temporarily needed by Seaside-Tests-Session, see Issue 309)
  * Seaside-Tests-Session
 * Seaside-Component
  * Seaside-Tests-Component (for defects see Issue 318)
 * Seaside-!RenderLoop
  * Seaside-Tests-!RenderLoop (this is an essentially empty package with no tests)
 * Seaside-Tools-Core
 * Seaside-Environment
  * Seaside-Tests-Environment (for defects see Issue 319)

= Traditional =
 * (functional tests)
  * Seaside-Tests-Functional
  * Seaside-Tests-Squeak-Functional
 * Seaside-Squeak-Continuation
  * Seaside-Tests-Squeak-Continuation
 * Seaside-Flow
 * Seaside-Squeak-Flow
  * Seaside-Tests-Flow (for defects see Issue 309)
 * Seaside-Tools-Web
 * Seaside-Squeak-Tools-Web
  * Seaside-Tests-Tools-Web
 * Seaside-Development
 * Seaside-Squeak-Development
  * Seaside-Tests-Development
  * Seaside-Tests-Squeak-Development
 * Seaside-Examples

= Admin Tools =
 * Seaside-Tools-!OmniBrowser
 * Seaside-Squeak-Tools-!OmniBrowser

= RSS =
 * RSS-Core
  * RSS-Tests-Core
 * RSS-Examples

= Javascript =
 * Javascript-Core
 * Javascript-Squeak-Core
  * Javascript-Tests-Core

= JQuery =
 * JQuery-Core
   * JQuery-Tests-Core
 * JQuery-UI
   * JQuery-Tests-UI

= Scriptaculous =
 * Scriptaculous-Core
  * Scriptaculous-Tests-Core
 * Scriptaculous-Components
  * Scriptaculous-Tests-Components

= HTML 5 =
 * Seaside-HTML5
  * Seaside-Tests-HTML5

= Internet Explorer =
 * Seaside-!InternetExplorer
  * Seaside-Tests-!InternetExplorer

= Email =
 * Seaside-Email
  * Seaside-Tests-Email
 * Seaside-Squeak-Email

= Comanche =
 * !DynamicBindings
 * !KomServices
 * !KomHttpServer
 * Seaside-Adaptors-Comanche
  * Seaside-Tests-Adaptors-Comanche

= Comet =
 * Comet-Core
  * Comet-Tests-Core
 * Comet-Squeak-Core
 * Comet-Examples

= Swazoo 2 =
 * SPort
 * Swazoo 2
 * Seaside-Swazoo (LGPL)
 * Seaside-Adaports-Swazoo

= File System =
 * SPort
 * Seaside-Canvas
 * load from the [http://www.squeaksource.com/Seaside29LGPL LGPL repository]
 * Seaside-!FileSystem
